segments.text: I'd like to buy a bottle of Centrum , a tooth brushes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Centrum ? We have bottles of thirty and one hundred tablets . Which kind do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me one bottle of thirty tablets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what kind of toothbrushes would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a look at them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . This brand is supposed to be very good , but they're expensive . Those are new products . They come in several colors and sizes . There is also hard , soft , and medium .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one is 5 % off . That one has no reduction , but you can get a free tube of toothpaste with six toothbrushes .
segments.speaker: S2
